Constructor Detail

AppletMenuBar

public AppletMenuBar()
Create a new component that simulates a menubar by displaying the specified labels. Whenever the user clicks the specified label, popup up the PopupMenu specified in the menus array. Elements of the menus arra may be a static PopupMenu object, or a PopupMenuFactory object for dynamically creating menus. Perhaps we'll also provide some other kind of constructor or factory method that reads popup menus out of a config file.

addNotify

public void addNotify()
